statements: DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' AND precipitation = 0.5;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2022-07-15' AND temperature > 30.0;
DELETE FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE irrigation_zone = 3 AND duration < 60;
DELETE FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE date = '2022-09-15' AND watering_amount < 20;
DELETE FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE watering_amount < 10.0 AND date < '2022-05-01';
DELETE FROM SoilAnalysis WHERE ph_level < 6.0 AND nutrient_levels->>'nitrogen' > 'medium';
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE Temperature > 30 AND Humidity < 50;
